Desc.entry: Fun music and singing sessions for parents or carers and their children. Classes contains many types of songs aimed at developing normal speech patterns, co-ordination, rhythm, musical pitch and love of music. Sessions for children aged 6 months-2 years and 2-4. Large play room available for free play before or after morning music sessions. Tea, coffee, biscuits and juice provided. Free first trial session - please ring to book.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Monday & Tuesday mornings, please contact for details
Friday mornings, please contact for details
